about_the_game:
"The medical examination diary: the exciting days of me and my senpai" is a novel game without choices.

Feature


  • Smooth character animation via the E-mote system
  • reathtaking FHD illustrations

Story


Takuya just finished medical school and started as an intern at the hospital. The preceptor who was assigned to him was his senpai that he looked up to, Ryou. He had strived to follow in her footsteps, but she was always a couple steps ahead. Reunited with his childhood friend Mio and subject to Ryou’s temptations, how will he proceed against the obstacles that he should overcome?

Character




Ryo Amagi CV:Sazanami Suzu

  • Height: about 160cm-ish?
  • weight: around 48kg
  • B:W:H measurement: why you asking me for? what a noughty boy...
  • Bust: Personal confidential (surely more than 90cm! : by Head nurse)
  • Waist: Personal confidential (looks so fragile,less than 60cm I guess : by Internal medicine nurse)
  • Hip: Personal confidential (Late 80cm. wanna get flattened by that hip: by male patient)
  • Blood type: RH-O
  • Date of birth: 8th November
  • Zodiac sign: Scorpio

The senpai in the Takuya`s university, and also his preceptor when he was transfered to internal medicine for training.

She is gentle to children, elders, and female patients, but she would show her sadistic face to any male with no hesitation.
Takuya is no exeption too, she often teases him by words even during the lesson. But at the same time, she is the person who takes good care of other, so basically she is pretty reliable.

As being the niece of the president of the Amagi university hospital, she was assigned as supervising doctor even she was young and inexperienced.

Inwardly she looks forward to have a new younger colleague who is worth teasing.

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains a small number of CGs, including sexual of some characters.
Scenes of sexual activity are not included.
All characters involved in sexual content are over the age of 18.

name: The medical examination diary: the exciting days of me and my senpai

package_groups.name: default

subs.option_text: The medical examination diary: the exciting days of me and my senpai - $12.99 USD

package_groups.title: Buy The medical examination diary: the exciting days of me and my senpai

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows8.1/10/11 (Windows RT and 10 Mobile are not supported)
  • Processor: Intel Core i Processor Series (Low Voltage Processor is not supported)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: HD Graphics 620
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card that supports DirectSound
  • Additional Notes: Support Pixel Shaders 2.0 or higher required / A pointing device required
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows8.1/10/11 (Windows RT and 10 Mobile are not supported)
  • Processor: Intel Core i Processor Series (Low Voltage Processor is not supported)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 1030
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card that supports DirectSound
  • Additional Notes: 1920x1080px or higher / Support Pixel Shaders 2.0 or higher required / A pointing device required

short_description: Would you like to start the love romance by your senpai that you desired? "The medical examination diary: the exciting days of me and my senpai" is the novel game.
supported_languages:
English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese*
*languages with full audio support
